summary: Frontend UI testing completed for SaleMate POS app. Tested auth flows (signin/signup), legal screens (Privacy Policy, Data Deletion), settings page with legal links, today-sales empty state with return/exchange hint, and payment page with credit option. Most features working correctly after expo restart. Button click handling issue in React Native Web requires JS click workaround.

ui_bugs.issue: React Native Web TouchableOpacity buttons don't respond to Playwright .click() - requires JavaScript dispatchEvent to click
ui_bugs.selector: text=Sign In, text=Sign Up, text=Get Started
ui_bugs.workaround: Use page.evaluate() with direct click() or dispatchEvent() to trigger button actions

issues: Shows 'POS System' as title when shop name not set up - expected behavior but could show 'SaleMate' as default instead

action_items: Consider adding data-testid attributes to buttons for more reliable test automation
Optional: Add fallback title 'SaleMate' on home page when shop name is not configured
critical_code_review_comments: Button click handling in React Native Web may need accessibility improvements for better automation testing support
Legal links (Privacy Policy, Data Deletion) are properly implemented on signin, signup, and settings pages
seed_data_creation: Created test user via API: testuser_api123/testpass123
